item.description:
Part 1 of 4 in Witchcraft Training Series

This is the first introductory class, in the series of (4) classes of training towards the Level of the First Degree towards Priest/ Priestess training.

Classes will be Sunday afternoons from 2:00-4:30 pm

Class Schedule is as follows:

Class l - Sun, Jan 29th

The difference between Wicca & Witchcraft
Wiccan Glossary
Wiccan Beliefs
Wiccan Rede
3-Fold Law
Pentacle & Pentagram

Class 2 - Sun, Feb 12th

The Wiccan Way
httHistory of Paganism
The Burning Times
Salem Witch Trials

Class 3 - Sun, Feb 26th

Important Pagan People
Witches Rede of Chivalry
Intro to the (8) Sabbats
The Esbats
The Elements
13 Goals of a Witch

Class 4 - Sun, March 11th

Principles of Pagan Belief
The Moon & Her Phases
The God & The Goddess
Pagan Ettiquette
Wiccan Traditions

Class 5 - Sun, March 25

Rites of Passage
Intro to Gardnerian Wicca
Covens & Degree Systems
Initiation
How to Meditate/ Group Exercise

Class 6 - Sun, April 11 th

Intro to Ritual
Book of Shadow/ Grimoires
Numerology/ How to find your Witch Name
How to find a "Healthy" Coven/ Teacher/ Group/ Avoid the bad ones!
Class Activity: Psychic Exercises
Dedication

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There are (6) classes for each level which is
$15 per class; $90.00 per course, which includes
all paperwork to build your book of shadows on CD.
If you would like a printed book, it is an additional $15.00 for printing only.
Each level fills a 1 1/2 notebook binder, to be
provided by the student. Course costs are due
prior to, or by the start of the class.
Will accept cash, check or credit-

The store requires a $10 deposit prior to the first day of class to hold your seat-

Which can be paid at the intro class, or in store, or over the phone prior to the day of the class- For more information on this, please contact store owner Ron at:

774-745-8550

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Each course builds upon the other.

To check out information on all of the levels, view pictures and testimonials of previous students, go to:

http://community-2.we....

Upcoming Class for Level 2 "Living a Magickal Life" will be:

Sundays:

April 25th

May 9th

May 23rd

June 6th
item.name: Wicca 1- Intro to Wicca
